languages.text: When an Imperial world character is affected by an ally's non-damaging {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} or affects an ally with such an ability, their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} is increased by {uip|Resolve|ede94fd520554c3288633197b1f11bdc} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: Когда на персонажа с имперского мира действует {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} союзника, которая не наносит урон, или персонаж сам применяет к союзнику такую способность, то {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимость{/g} персонажа увеличивается на {uip|Resolve|ede94fd520554c3288633197b1f11bdc} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.

traits.locale_text: When an Imperial world character is affected by an ally's non-damaging ability or affects an ally with such an ability, their resolve is increased by <u>(FEL bonus / 2)</u> for 1 round.

When an Imperial world character is affected by an ally's non-damaging {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} or affects an ally with such an ability, their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} is increased by {uip|Resolve|ede94fd520554c3288633197b1f11bdc} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

When an Imperial world character is affected by an ally's non-damaging {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} or affects an ally with such an ability, their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} is increased by {uip|Resolve|ede94fd520554c3288633197b1f11bdc} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

When an Imperial world character is affected by an ally's non-damaging {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} or affects an ally with such an ability, their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} is increased by {uip|Resolve|ede94fd520554c3288633197b1f11bdc} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text: Wenn ein Charakter einer imperialen Welt von einer nicht schädigenden {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} eines Verbündeten betroffen ist oder einen Verbündeten mit einer solchen Fähigkeit beeinflusst, wird seine {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g} um {uip|Resolve|ede94fd520554c3288633197b1f11bdc} für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} erhöht.
languages.original_text: When an Imperial world character is affected by an ally's non-damaging {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} or affects an ally with such an ability, their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} is increased by {uip|Resolve|ede94fd520554c3288633197b1f11bdc} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Wenn ein Charakter einer imperialen Welt von einer nicht schädigenden {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} eines Verbündeten betroffen ist oder einen Verbündeten mit einer solchen Fähigkeit beeinflusst, wird seine {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g} um {uip|Resolve|ede94fd520554c3288633197b1f11bdc} für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} erhöht.

Wenn ein Charakter einer imperialen Welt von einer nicht schädigenden {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} eines Verbündeten betroffen ist oder einen Verbündeten mit einer solchen Fähigkeit beeinflusst, wird seine {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g} um <u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}GEF-{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} / 2)</u> für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} erhöht.

languages.text: Lorsqu'un allié confère une {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} qui n'inflige pas de dégâts à un personnage issu d'un monde impérial, ou inversement si celui-ci confère une telle capacité à un allié, la {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g} du personnage issu d'un monde impérial augmente de {uip|Resolve|ede94fd520554c3288633197b1f11bdc} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: When an Imperial world character is affected by an ally's non-damaging {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} or affects an ally with such an ability, their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} is increased by {uip|Resolve|ede94fd520554c3288633197b1f11bdc} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Lorsqu'un allié confère une {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} qui n'inflige pas de dégâts à un personnage issu d'un monde impérial, ou inversement si celui-ci confère une telle capacité à un allié, la {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g} du personnage issu d'un monde impérial augmente de {uip|Resolve|ede94fd520554c3288633197b1f11bdc} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

Lorsqu'un allié confère une {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} qui n'inflige pas de dégâts à un personnage issu d'un monde impérial, ou inversement si celui-ci confère une telle capacité à un allié, la {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g} du personnage issu d'un monde impérial augmente de {uip|Resolve|ede94fd520554c3288633197b1f11bdc} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text: 当帝国世界的角色受到盟友非伤害性{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}影响，或是使用非伤害性能力影响盟友时，此角色的{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}会获得加成，等同于{uip|Resolve|ede94fd520554c3288633197b1f11bdc}，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
languages.original_text: When an Imperial world character is affected by an ally's non-damaging {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} or affects an ally with such an ability, their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} is increased by {uip|Resolve|ede94fd520554c3288633197b1f11bdc} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当帝国世界的角色受到盟友非伤害性{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}影响，或是使用非伤害性能力影响盟友时，此角色的{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}会获得加成，等同于<u>（{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}/2）</u>，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
当帝国世界的角色受到盟友非伤害性{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}影响，或是使用非伤害性能力影响盟友时，此角色的{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}会获得加成，等同于{uip|Resolve|ede94fd520554c3288633197b1f11bdc}，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

languages.text: Cuando un personaje de mundo Imperial se ve afectado por una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} no dañina de un aliado o afecta a un aliado con una capacidad no dañina, su {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} aumenta en {uip|Resolve|ede94fd520554c3288633197b1f11bdc} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.
languages.original_text: When an Imperial world character is affected by an ally's non-damaging {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} or affects an ally with such an ability, their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} is increased by {uip|Resolve|ede94fd520554c3288633197b1f11bdc} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cuando un personaje de mundo Imperial se ve afectado por una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} no dañina de un aliado o afecta a un aliado con una capacidad no dañina, su {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} aumenta en <u>({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}EMP{/g} / 2)</u> durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.

Cuando un personaje de mundo Imperial se ve afectado por una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} no dañina de un aliado o afecta a un aliado con una capacidad no dañina, su {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} aumenta en {uip|Resolve|ede94fd520554c3288633197b1f11bdc} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.

languages.text: インペリアルワールドのキャラクターが味方の非ダメージ系{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}の効果を受けた時、または味方にそのようなアビリティを使った時、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}が{uip|Resolve|ede94fd520554c3288633197b1f11bdc}増加する。
languages.original_text: When an Imperial world character is affected by an ally's non-damaging {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} or affects an ally with such an ability, their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} is increased by {uip|Resolve|ede94fd520554c3288633197b1f11bdc} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: インペリアルワールドのキャラクターが味方の非ダメージ系{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}の効果を受けた時、または味方にそのようなアビリティを使った時、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}が<u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g} / 2)</u>増加する。

インペリアルワールドのキャラクターが味方の非ダメージ系{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}の効果を受けた時、または味方にそのようなアビリティを使った時、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}が{uip|Resolve|ede94fd520554c3288633197b1f11bdc}増加する。

languages.text: Bir İmparatorluk Dünyası karakteri, bir dost birimin hasar vermeyen {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetinden{/g} etkilenir veya bir dost birimi böyle bir kabiliyetle etkilerse {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}kararlılık{/g} değeri {uip|Resolve|ede94fd520554c3288633197b1f11bdc} artar. Bu etki, 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer.
